import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.ba64476d:
x = ['A','B','AB','O']
y = [30 , 24,  8 , 38]
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
axs = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
axs.bar(x=x,height=y,width=0.5,color='#8BC34A',edgecolor='#33691E',linewidth=1.5)
axs.set_xlabel("Blood type")
axs.set_ylabel("Number")
source.a3e6e063:
lables = ['A','B','AB','O']
numbers = [30 , 24,  8 , 38]
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
axs = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
axs.pie(x=numbers,labels=lables,labeldistance=0.8,shadow=True,colors=['#EF5350','#EC407A','#AB47BC','#7E57C2'])
axs.set_title("Bloods")
source.9d292d49:
x = [5,7,8,7,2,17,2,9,4,1,12,9,6]
y = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]
fig = plt.figure()
axs = plt.scatter(x=x,y=y,color='#03A9F4')
plt.title("main lable")
plt.xlabel("x lable")
plt.ylabel("y lable")
source.64e41e82:
data = np.random.normal(170,10,300)
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
axs = plt.hist(data,color='#03A9F4')
